definitions.definition: A sudden transient rush, flood or increase.
definitions.example: He felt a surge of excitement.

definitions.definition: The maximum amplitude of a vehicle's forward/backward oscillation
A sudden electrical spike or increase of voltage and current.
definitions.example: A power surge at that generator created a blackout across the whole district.

definitions.definition: The swell or heave of the sea. (FM 55-501).
The tapered part of a windlass barrel or a capstan, upon which the cable surges, or slips.
To rush, flood, or increase suddenly.

definitions.example: A ship surges forwards, sways sideways and heaves up.
